message.body: I think I figured out the main reason I don't like Boston and I'm telling you because #### gets pissed when I talk shit on the place we live for whatever reason
I think the people and the culture are inauthentic in a way that fetishizes artifice and mediocrity in a very suburban way
They're like snobby in a lame way
LOL. Yes! That's what always drove me crazy. There is so much snobbery and frankly, it is not warranted
Also the bandwagon sports stuff, holy crap, they basically pretend a team has died if they have a bad season
Okay good, i was like "######## will understand!"
Right, which would be OK if they could name more than one guy on the team, but they can't
This is why I'm so much more comfortable with Philly by comparison. We are often assholes, but there is no pretense of anything else. It's a very "real" city
And we know who our loser professional athletes are
I miss you a ton. I told #### yesterday that I desperately want to get drunk and watch ################ with you
Yeees, we've been talking about our next trip, we have a DC thing in April and Europe in the fall, Philly somewhere in the middle
I approve. Let me know when. You're of course welcome to stay at my place if you like. No spare room but I have the pullout sofa bed
Also trying to figure out if we can do the ##############, too
